results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} k! * binomial(n,k) * binomial(2*n+1,k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..365
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
maple: a := n -> add(k!*binomial(n, k)*binomial(2*n+1, k), k=0..n):
a := n -> n!*LaguerreL(n, n+1, -1): # _Peter Luschny_, May 02 2021
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[k! * Binomial[n, k] * Binomial[2*n+1, k], {k, 0, n}]; Array[a, 20, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 01 2021 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n, k!*binomial(n, k)*binomial(2*n+1, k));
